content: --- title: Flight Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-09-17T08:21:41.502Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:25:02.351Z --- # Flight Leg Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Flights:** * `schedops.LEG.ENTRY_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date and `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` <> (“Z-Ground“) **Alternative Airports:** * `schedops.ALTERNATE_AIRPORTS.LAST_UPDATE` > Last Data Retrieval Date **Check-in Status:** * Flight leg list conditions(From 3 hours before the departure time, to 1 hour after the departure time); * `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` - 3 hours <= Current Date(UTC) <= `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` + 1 hour and * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` <> (“Z-Ground“ or “Y-None Flight Internal usage“) **Boarding Start Date:** * Flight leg list conditions(From 180 minutes before the departure time, to 40 minutes after the departure time); * (`schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` - 180 minutes <= Current Date(UTC) <= `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` + 40 minutes) and * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) #### - Source Service **Check-in Status:** * `flightInfoDisplay` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_CheckIn_WS/services/CheckinPort` * Method: `flightInfoDisplay` **Boarding Start Date:** * `FlightManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_Booking_WS/services/FlightPort` * Method: `retrieveFlightManifest` #### - Source Query **Flights:** `Riverx_FlightLeg_Query` **Alternative Airports:** `Riverx_AlternativeAirport_Query` **Check-in Status:** `Riverx_FlightLegCheckedIn_Query` **Boarding Start Date:** `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger**: * **Flights:** Every minute * **Alternative Airports** & **Check-in Status** & **Boarding Start Date**: Every 5 minutes **Steps**: * **Flights:** Execute `Riverx_FlightLeg_Query` query. * **Alternative
